  - name: ReflectionMetadataItem.Constraint
    summary: |
      Describes a constraint for a single-argument function whose argument type
      is a Class.Object.ClassName.
    description: |
      Describes a constraint for a single-argument function whose argument type
      is a Class.Object.ClassName. Currently there are two constraints
      available:



      Constraint
      Description


      isScriptCreatable
      The specified class must be creatable with Instance.new


      isService
      The specified class must be a service.


    codesamples: []
    type: string
